# Wifi QRCode generator

[![GitHub License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/KirianCaumes/Wifi-QRCode-Generator?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4wIiBlbmNvZGluZz0iaXNvLTg4NTktMSI%%2BDQo8L3N2Zz4%3D&logoColor=fff&label=License)](https://github.com/KirianCaumes/Wifi-QRCode-Generator/blob/master/LICENSE) ![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/KirianCaumes/Wifi-QRCode-Generator?style=flat&logo=github&label=Stars&color=%23181717) [![Support this project](https://img.shields.io/badge/Support%20this%20project-003087?logo=PayPal&logoColor=fff)](https://www.paypal.me/KirianCaumes)

A basic script to generate an image with a QR Code to easily share your Wifi. ðŸ“¶

![Example](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24525092/220751422-9331a010-40c1-4913-9c89-9b60f6c2ad47.png)

## How to use

Install dependecies with:

```sh
npm install
```

Start the script with and follow the instructions:

```sh
npm start
```

## How to contribute/develop

There is a [devcontainer](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/devcontainers/containers) on that project already configured, feel free to use it.

Install dependecies with:

```sh
npm install
```

Start the script:

```sh
npm start
```

You can open a pull request with your new additions.
